fields.name: Seraph's Embrace
fields.description: +80 Ability Power +1000 Mana +50% Base Mana Regen UNIQUE Passive - Insight: Grants Ability Power equal to 3% of maximum Mana. UNIQUE Active - Mana Shield: Consumes 20% of current Mana to grant a shield for 3 seconds that absorbs damage equal to 150 plus the amount of Mana consumed (120 second cooldown). (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
